Unique factorization

  • Irreducible: For , is irreducible if it’s not reducible not constant and is not the product of two non-constant polyonmials.
  • Every non-constant polyonmial is a product of irredicibles
    • Proof: Inductively decompose into irreducibles (termination is difficult)
  • If is irreducible and then or .
    • , different irreducible domain
    • Notably, is a UFD
  • A field has division, while a domain does not necessarily
